articles.title: Tobi Burns
articles.contents:
The Great Dispersal
          
          
          Home
          About
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Tobi Burns
          
          
            
              I am a classically trained data scientist living in the San Francisco Bay Area. Currently I work on the Oculus team at Facebook. I love talking about baseball, true crime podcasts, and causal inference.
            
            
              I am a classically trained data scientist living in the San Francisco Bay Area. Currently I work on the Oculus team at Facebook.
